definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: This pesticide is diluted with water and applied directly to the fields.
sentences.chinese: 这种杀虫剂用水稀释后直接施用在田里。

sentences.english: This example indicates a new way of finding new insecticidal crystal protein.
sentences.chinese: 这为寻找新异杀虫晶体蛋白基因开辟了新的思路。

sentences.english: The insect-killing machine has the advantage of better insect-killing effect.
sentences.chinese: 本杀虫机具有杀虫效果较佳的优点。

sentences.english: The insect-killing machine has the advantage of better insect-killing effect.
sentences.chinese: 本杀虫机具有杀虫效果较佳的优点。

sentences.english: Yet, right now, we have new, long-lasting insecticidal mosquito nets.
sentences.chinese: 但是，现在我们有新的长效杀虫剂蚊帐。

sentences.english: The development of new, alternative insecticides is an expensive and long-term endeavour.
sentences.chinese: 新的替代杀虫剂的研发是一项昂贵的长期努力。

sentences.english: Five synthesis methods of the third generation nicotinic insecticide-dinotefuran are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了第三代烟碱类杀虫剂呋虫胺的5种合成方法。

sentences.english: The insecticidal action must be considered doubtful.
sentences.chinese: 这个杀虫作用是值得怀疑的。

sentences.english: Pumpkin pleasant is lukewarm, the beneficial in can filling is angry, know wind acetanilide, detoxify kills insect.
sentences.chinese: 南瓜甘温，能补中益气，通络止痛，解毒杀虫。

sentences.english: A facultative pathogen of some insect species commonly used as a biopesticide.
sentences.chinese: 一些昆虫的兼性病原物，常用作生物杀虫剂。

sentences.english: The results showed that the insecticides were more compatible with B. bassiana than the fungicides.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，杀虫剂与球孢白僵菌的相容性好于杀菌剂。

sentences.english: I used weedkiller to get rid of the weeds in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 我用杀虫剂来除掉花园里的虫子。

sentences.english: The development of biopesticides is progressing rapidly.
I was glad I had not pulled out the insecticide to begin with
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴一开始我没有拿出杀虫剂来杀虫。

sentences.english: I was glad I had not pulled out the insecticide to begin with
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴一开始我没有拿出杀虫剂来杀虫。

sentences.english: “Get you some wasp spray, ” she says. “It’ll put their eyes out.”
sentences.chinese: “你去搞罐杀虫喷雾剂，”她说，“喷瞎他们。”

definition: trichlorphon C4H8Cl3PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide/also called dipterex
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
